overview:
Marc Planchette is CEO & Founder of EREGEX INC., a web-based solution of dematerialization of contracts, registered letters with ack of receipt, ordinary letters and invoices (sequestered by a Bailiff).

EREGEX guarantees:

  • Computer and legal security
  • Auto-archiving of documents signed by an electronic signature
  • Probative value of electronic exchanges
  • Up to 80% of savings on administrative costs of mails, archiving and management of data.
